article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi.
article.content:
​

The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to assisting small and medium-sized Mississippi firms with promoting their products and services to markets worldwide. With a global network of trade specialists and commercial officers in over 85 countries, our experienced staff is uniquely positioned to help your firm launch or expand your export business. By working with our office, your company can gain access to 95 percent of the world consumers who live outside of the United States.

Our qualified team of trade specialists can provide the following assistance:

  • Help you locate prospective buyers, agents, distributors, representatives, and licensing and joint-venture partners,
  • Provide competent information and guidance regarding the export process,
  • Help you identify international markets of opportunity,
  • Provide comprehensive and accurate market research for targeted country markets,
  • Provide business background/credit investigations on prospective buyers and representatives,
  • Promote your products/services worldwide, and
  • Refer you to other qualified resources for export financing, logistics support, licensing, and trade leads.


Contact Us Today!​

  • ​MSUSEAC Staff
